replies.body:
Several days, and no response from any Riot reps on why both Arclight Vayne and Yasuo have been completely overlooked this month even though they were on the sales schedule.  COME ON RIOT! WHAT GIVES?!? 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Is it just me, or did they completely forget to put Arclight {{champion:67}} on sale??? I've checked every single sales release this month and it is nowhere to be found. It's the only one I'm waiting for...

Umm Rito?

I'm glad I'm not the only one! I thought I might have missed it.  Have been waiting for Arclight Vayne since I saw it on the sales schedule when they released it in April!  They just love to play with our emotions....
make sales for ip as well as rp please rito{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Did they forget to oust Yasuo on sale? I saw Yasuo in the sale schedule. I've been waiting for Yasuo for the whole month.
